Lack enough support: The claim lacks evidence to support the assertion that news media is currently using the photo from the movie "Unlocked" to illustrate the COVID-19 situation in Italy.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photo in question was originally taken in 2013 and appeared in a news story about African migrants, not related to COVID-19.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the extent to which the photo is being used by credible news organizations to depict the COVID-19 pandemic in Italy.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photo from the movie "Unlocked" is being used by news media without providing any evidence or substantiation.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the photo is from a 2017 movie and has no current relevance to the COVID-19 situation in Italy.
